nodes.name: Herbert's Integer Selection System (HISS)
nodes.summary: Allows several in-game menus to be navigated by using the 0-9 number keys. Some menus can now also be closed by pressing Escape. (See screenshots.) Requires MWSE.

nodes.name: MCM Tyranny
nodes.summary: Lets you take back control over the MCM and hide any mods from it that you please.

nodes.name: herbert's literacy program
nodes.summary: Fundamental overhaul to the way skill books work. Studying skill books will grant permanent bonuses to the relevant skill. The bonus depends on the skill being studied. You can't learn everything in one sitting: you will need to study the

nodes.name: Birthsign Thief
nodes.summary: Slightly buffs the Thief birthsign. Those with the Thief birthsign will now steal the abilities from all other birthsigns. Requires MWSE.

nodes.name: Quick Select Menu
nodes.summary: Adds a quick select menu, trying to fill the gap between quick key items and the rest of your inventory. The menu has several tabs, some of which are generated automatically, based on your inventory. e.g., press a button to see all your

nodes.name: HUD Cleaner
nodes.summary: Dynamically hides HUD elements when they aren't relevant. Hides health/magicka/fatigue if they're above 90%. Hides magic icons resulting from permanent bonuses/constant enchantments. Hides weapon/magic icons when weapons are holstered.

nodes.name: Quest Log Menu
nodes.summary: Lets you keep track of, and search for, all your active/completed quests by using a dedicated menu. Has robust search functionalities and several convenience features. All relevant journal entries are displayed directly below your quest

nodes.name: activate key takes open books
nodes.summary: if a book is open (i.e. the "Take" button is visible), you can take it by pressing the activate key. no mouse required. requires MWSE

nodes.name: Fortify Magicka Regeneration
nodes.summary: adds a fortify magicka regeneration effect to the game. just like in skyrim. 1 pt of the effect = 1% faster magicka regeneration. requires a compatible magicka regeneration mod.also adds a drain magicka regeneration effect, if you're into

nodes.name: Animated Containers Rewritten
nodes.summary: Based on qqqbbb's original mod, rewritten with a focus on interopability and stability. It is now considerably easier for other mods to play open/close animations.

nodes.name: experience carryover
nodes.summary: this mod will make sure you get all the xp you were promised. surplus xp will no longer be lost when leveling up skills. e.g. if your progress towards a skill level up was 95/100 and you got 20xp, the skill will level up and your progress

nodes.name: athletics armor xp mod
nodes.summary: atheltics experience will be divided up among different armor skills, depending on how much armor of each type you have equipped.

nodes.name: Barter XP Overhaul
nodes.summary: Overhauls the barter XP formula, with the intention of being more realistic and cutting down on the cheese. XP is now awarded based on the value of the sale and how well you've haggled. Designed to be extensible and highly compatible with

nodes.name: More QuickLoot
nodes.summary: QuickLoot, with many new features and a revamped UI. Pick up one item from a stack, see item prices and weights, pickup nearby items. Dedicated menus for bartering, pickpocketing, plants, and training, each with their own features and

nodes.name: Proportional Magicka Regeneration
nodes.summary: Willpower will determine the percentage of your maximum magicka that gets regenerated each second. Highly configurable. Atronachs can regenerate magicka with customizable penalties, or not at all. Works for the player and NPCs. Restores

nodes.name: herbert lib
nodes.summary: Lua library that includes a new logger, a way to automate the creation of Classes (supporting multiple inheritence, instance checking, and some dataclass-like functionality), and a way to generate polynomial splines. Requires MWSE-lua, but

nodes.name: Proportional Progression Expanded
nodes.summary: Updated verison of NullCascade's Proportional Progression, with MCM support and some new features: custom profiles, modifiers for major/minor/misc/specialization skills, and more. Backwards compatible with the original mod. Requires
